item.title: There are some fly tipping happened again. Some of them are building wastes., 25th September

item.title: Large object hanging from roof, 25th September
item.description:
Hi there, I believe there is a large object (looks like a window fitting/door frame) hanging over the roof of Johnson’s Place which looks like a *major* health and safety risks for pedestrians walking by underneath. Johnson’s Place, Churchill Gardens. SW1.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Johnson's Place, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Would it be possible for you to reattach the dog fouling signs in Fernhead Road and Shirland Road?, 25th September
item.description:
Would it be possible for you to reattach the dog fouling signs in Fernhead Road and Shirland Road? Because I feel that the culprits who are responsible for the fouling have pulled them down!! Or would it be possible for you to have the Wardens regularly patrol these roads? Because the dog fouling has once again become rife in these streets!! With the darker nights looming, people, or children will be stepping into the fouling!! Westminster have been working very hard in respects to this matter. And it is greatly appreciated. Well done and keep up with the good work because it is greatly appreciated. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various lamp columns not working on roundabout, 25th September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red powder on street's, 25th September
item.description:
A person consistently pours a lot of red powder onto the pavement, with the intention of harming the pets in the area. This person used to pour pure bleach on the oavement previously. this needs to be addressed immediately as this is dangerous for pets and children.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Credon Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extreme wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front 217-219 Shirland Road. Besides the pole that has the direction signs attached to it., 24th September
item.description:
Extreme wet dog fouling on the pavement which is in front 217-219 Shirland Road. The fouling is besides the pole that has the direction signs attached to it. 217-219 Shirland Road is, the Kennedy's hardware store. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox decomposing and causing smell, 24th September

item.title: Wood panels fly tipped on Southwold Road, 24th September
item.description:
I caught someone fly tipping. When I asked him what he was doing, he pretended not to hear me and avoided me. I didn’t insist as I was with my family and didn’t feel safe. I managed to catch his matriculation plate: CX14 YUW. Silver Ford Focus.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
